short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making The Front Page Great Again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sernie Banders alleviates some of the monotony that has gripped the front page of Reddit in recent months by replacing occurences of the term 'Bernie Sanders' with one of several fitting and recognizable synonyms.
